message.name: ERR_RECEIVED_PARAM_CAST_FAILED
message.locale: The received parameter could not be cast to the expected type in the class %1s.

message.name: ERR_RECEIVED_PARAM_IS_NULL
message.locale: The required parameter is NULL in the class %1s.

message.name: ERR_MESSAGE_CREATION_FAILED
message.locale: An error occurred while creating an XML message in the class %1s

message.name: ERR_MESSAGE_TIMEOUT_RETURN
message.locale: The request to the external system failed. Please try again.
